name: Archery
description: Archery is the skill associated with using bows, crossbows, and similar torsion-based weapons.

name: Axes and Choppas
description: Axes and Choppas is the skill that applies to axes, hatchets, and other such weapons.

name: Brawling
description: Brawling is used when you’re fighting unarmed, or using natural weaponry

name: Climb
description: Climb is the skill associated with climbing and navigating treacherous slopes.

name: Clubs and Maces
description: Clubs and Maces covers most sorts of bashing weaponry, including staves.

name: Dagger
description: The dagger skill covers the usage of every sort of knife in hand-to-hand combat.

name: Dodge
description: The dodge skill adds to a character’s agility when he uses the full defense option.

name: Fishing
description: The fishing skill is used when trying to catch fish with a net or pole.

name: Flight
description: The flight skill is used when trying to maneuver in midair, or fall without dying.

name: Guns
description: Guns is the skill associated with gunpowder-based weaponry.

name: Ride
description: The ride skill covers staying mounted and maneuvering your mount. Also used to hang on to unwilling mounts.

name: Shields
description: The shields skill covers the usage of most shields as weapons, and adds to a user’s armor rating when they use the full defense option.

name: Siege Weapons
description: The siege weapon skill is applied when using catapults, trebuchets, ballista, cannon, and other large engines of war.

name: Spears and Polearms
description: The spears and polearms skill covers most sorts of long-shafted weaponry that has pointy or slashy bits on the end.

name: Stealth
description: The stealth skill is used when trying to hide or sneak past trouble.

name: Swim
description: The swim skill is a factor whenever you’re trying to maneuver through or traverse water.

name: Swords
description: The swords skill covers every kind of sword-based weaponry.

name: Throwing
description: The throwing skill is used whenever a character tries to accurately throw an object, whether an easy toss to a friend, or a hard throw at an enemy.

name: Whips and Flails
description: The whips and flails skill covers all sorts of flexible weaponry, including weird things like nets.
